profile.headline: Novice IT Developer | Stock Investor & Business Enthusiast
profile.short_bio: Hello! My name is Farid Ahmad Fakih, I am a passionate person and have a great interest in information technology and finance. I am still beginner, with some experience work in business and information technology. I am a person who always strives to learn and develop my skills. I love challenges and am not afraid to explore new things. In addition, I enjoy collaborating with others and sharing experiences, as I believe that learning from each other is the best way to grow.

experiences.title: Research & Technology Division Member
experiences.description: Berkontribusi aktif dalam pengembangan proyek open source.

experiences.title: Founder & Developer
experiences.description: Membangun algoritma screening saham otomatis menggunakan Python dan mengelola portofolio investasi pribadi.

experiences.title: Full-stack Web Developer Intern
experiences.description: Create and develop complex Point of Sales websites based on market demand. Learn, lead, and manage programming teams, fostering a collaborative and results-oriented work environment.

experiences.title: Program Administrator Intern
experiences.description: Involved as an administrator of the market e-retribution program from DISPERINDAG Sragen to maintain and also develop the program. See and analyze the needs of market levies to create the right program for government needs
